SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my body's blood!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Cripes, that door weighed a ton.
Thought I'd never get outta there. Well, looks like I'm in a boneyard—and I
guess that heavy door was a tombstone?
Heck, what kind of door connects to a grave?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
My master lives once more! All hail
the Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here
and now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
I see your head has found its way back upon
your shoulders, Master! Also, you seem to have
been restored to a younger self—more blessings
from the Dismal King, to be certain. Now rest easy, for I, Dolores, shall
serve you as we work to restore the
Dismal King himself!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Sorry, but who are you?
And who's this king fella?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Goodness! It seems this resurrection
has left your memory scrambled. But worry not, for I, your loyal servant
Dolores, will aid you with anything
and everything your heart desires.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Oh! How strange it is for you to introduce
yourself to me, Master! Also, sort of...
disturbing, I guess? Thankfully, we just need a little shock
to the system to restore those memories,
so let's go see the wardens of the
watchtowers who took your life!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Cripes, this lady really thinks I'm her dead
master. Can't believe I look that much like
the guy, but... Eh, why sweat the details?
Let's just see how this plays out.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_000_CUT.text:
Come, Master!
The first tower awaits!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.text:
Oh! How strange it is for you to introduce
yourself to me, Master! Well, if we want to
get your memories back, we've no choice but
to retrace your steps. And while I understand your being hesitant
to remember the moment you were brutally
beheaded, there's, um...not really another
option. Sorry!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_010_CUT.text:
Time to get going, then!
We're off to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
I beseech you, O Dismal King!
Return life to my master in exchange
for my precious ring, which I offer
now unto the Well of Desires!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Cripes, who turned out the lights?
I can't see a dang thing.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Wait, no. That bit there is blackish red
and round... Like a black sun, maybe?
Might as well go that way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Well, ain't that a deal? Thought it was
a black sun, but turns out it's the mouth
of a well—and I guess this ring was what
looked so round?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
My master lives once more! All hail the
Dismal King! I, Dolores, swear here and
now that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
The thing led me here,
which I sure appreciate.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Bud...? No, Master! I am your loyal servant,
Dolores! Did the shock of being so brutally
murdered truly make you forget!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Nope. Also, I'm not your master.
I came here looking for spirit power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Greedy_Man
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Well, well! If it ain't Dolores! Bet I'd be
sittin' pretty with the wardens of the
watchtowers if I were to capture ya!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bloodthirsty_Woman
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, she caused a commotion at the towers,
all right—but I bet we'd be sittin' even
PRETTIER if we also gave 'em the weird
dude who just popped out of the well!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Guess it isn't normal for folks to be
poppin' outta wells over here, either.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, but this is grim indeed, Master!
These foul people intend to sell you
off to the wardens of the watchtowers!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Don't seem like the types to take no for
an answer, either. Bit of a shame to start
crackin' skulls when I just showed up here,
but guess I don't have a choice.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Greedy_Man
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Just climbed out of a well and already
lookin' for a fight? Well, bring it on,
'cause I'll put ya right back in the
ground where ya came from!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Bloodthirsty_Woman
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Corpse pays as much as a prisoner,
so let's just kill 'em all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Well, so much for the leisurely
spirit-hunting stroll I had planned.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Oh, indeed, Master—so instead, let's go to
the watchtowers and claim the keys to the
Dark Castle! This will all be resolved once
the Dismal King is restored, you see.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_100_CUT.text:
Sounds like a heck of a time.
Lead the way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
I can feel something in these ruins,
and each time I pray to the Dismal
King, the feeling becomes stronger.
Something...is coming.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
It's dark as a grave-digger's lunchpail
in here... Ack! Dang it. Tripped again. Feels like there's some kinda rubble on the
ground, and... Oh, hey, I hear somebody.
Let's head over that way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
My master is returned to me!
Huzzah! All hail the Dismal King!
I, Dolores, swear here and now
that we shall see you restored!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Really appreciate the help.
I might've wandered around in the dark
forever if you hadn't called out to me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Oh, I am not the one responsible, Master.
I implored the Dismal King every day,
and he at last saw fit to hear my prayers.
He made it so you would hear my voice!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
As much as I appreciate all of that,
I'm not your master, and I sure as shoot
don't know this Dismal King fella. But heck, if he's got the power to bring
dead folks back to life, it sounds like
he might be some kinda god.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
A...god? What are you talking about, Master?
Ah, of course! The shock of being revived
must have you all confused. I understand,
and will remain at your side to aid you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Swell. I'll leave all this to you, then.
Figure that's the best way to go about it
till I'm more used to this world, anyhow.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Let's start by heading for the Dark Castle
where the Dismal King resides. We won't
be able to get inside, but I still want to
offer up some words of thanks.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_DARKKING_START_200_CUT.text:
Sayin' kind words to folks who helped
ya is always a good thing in my books.
Let's get this show on the road.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text: So this is the Dark Castle, eh?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
O Dismal King, thank you for returning my
master to me! I beg of you, please wait
just a little longer, that we might see you
restored to your former glory once more!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text: Seems like some kinda seal, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Bet it'll bust wide open if
we put something here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Correct, Master! Each of the four wardens
of the watchtowers has hidden a key—
keys you died trying to acquire.
Er... Do you remember that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, cripes. I'm gettin' bad vibes just
from the towers—don't even wanna think
about what their wardens might be like.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
They are all terrible louts to the last!
So while we must get the keys from them,
we should avoid any head-on clashes.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_000_CUT_00.text:
So think before we act, basically?
Sounds like a good way to be.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.text:
They are all terrible louts to the last.
And since we need the keys anyway,
we should go kill every last one
of the miserable dastards!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_DOOR_010_CUT_00.text: Sounds like a plan to this guy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
I sit at the cusp of death, so starved am I!
Have you no thoughts at all as you gaze
upon my sallow, emaciated form?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
B-but we slaughtered an entire pig so
you might eat, milord! 'Tis all we had!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
You believe such a trifle could restore
my body to its full robustness? Pah! Well, if there is naught else to eat,
I've no choice but to consume you.
Though I'd hoped for something rather
more nutritious...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Begging your pardon, milord, but I am
with child. I beg of you, spare us
from the stewpot until he is born.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
A BABY!? Why didn't you fools
lead with that!? I will spare you today—but you must bring me
the child as soon as it is born. For unlike the
tough, bitter skins of adults, newborn babe is
soft and tender.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh, thank the heavens!
We survived another month.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
I wonder what my next tribute will be.
Pah! I am mere moments from wasting
away to skin and bone!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
That's the Warden of Gluttony, one of the
watchtower wardens with a key to the Dark
Castle. Despite eating everything he can get
his hands on, he's constantly hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Fella lives up to his name, I guess.
Still, sounds like I died once trying
to get the key from this guy, so I'd
like to avoid that happening again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text: Guess we just march right in.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
Yeah, maybe—but I wanna ask him some stuff
about this key thing. If worst-case happens and
the two of us have to duke it out, I'll hopefully
come out on top.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_SIN_000_CUT_0.text:
How honorable you are, Master! I mean,
it's a stupid way to go about things,
but I rather like that about you.
Now lead on and I shall follow!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
EEEK! Please, spare our miserable lives!
We've nothing else to give, I swear!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, we're not with that Tower of Gluttony fella;
I'm just trying to get my hands on a key to the
Dark Castle. You happen to know anything about
the Warden of Gluttony, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
A key to... Wait, are you trying to help
the Dismal King!? Oh, bless you, sir!
If he were back, we'd no longer have to
toil under the cruel yoke of the wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Alas, I fear we know very little about the
Warden of Gluttony, save that his hunger
cannot be slaked and he hoards more food
than any being could possibly consume.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, and he also enjoys uncommon food,
especially if he's never tasted it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Well, sounds like we need to enter the tower
with rare chow...or at least lots of some kind
of chow. Thanks for the help, folks—hope
your kid's born healthy and happy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
Let's just forget we even met the man.
It will be better that way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_HELP_000_CUT_.text:
So we need either lots of food,
or some kind of uncommon food.
Wonder where we might get that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
There's a livestock farm at the far end
of this town where meat is plentiful.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, I dunno. I've got nothing to trade for
a big pile of meat, and stealing one or two
critters probably won't satisfy that glutton.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: That's...a lot of dead pigs.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Sadly, the plague is ever spreading.
If not for your sake, Master,
I'd never come to such a place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Hey there, guy. I'm a, uh, pig inspector,
and I've come to take these here dead
fellas off your hands.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, that's the best damn news I've
heard all week! Take 'em all! But for god's sake, don't eat the things.
They'll kill you ten times before you
even hit the ground.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Yeah, I prefer my bacon disease-free,
but thanks for the heads-up.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
So we feed the dead pigs
to the Warden of Gluttony?
A brilliant plan, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Probably wanna save the praise until after
you've helped me haul a thousand tons
of rotting pork over to that tower.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Well, we're at the Tower of Gluttony.
What next, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: I hide in the meat and sneak inside!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: Let's offer the meat and negotiate.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Er, but that's just me.
You can skip that part.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Never! Where my master goes, I go—
even if that happens to be inside a
rotting, diseased, squishy pig corpse!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
The Warden of Gluttony is not one for
negotiation, Master; I fear this plan
will end with your death once again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Might not have been quite clear there.
When I say 'negotiate,' I mean, 'we feed
the guy ten tons of rotting meat and wait
for something weird to happen.'

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Oh! Well, that'll likely work out great.
Brilliant thinking, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Ah, I see my next offering has come.
Now what awaits me this day? Can it be!? Rotten meat—and in such great
quantities! Oh, but tonight will be an
evening of bliss for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
*chomp* *munch* *horf* *snarfle*
This smell! This flavor! This texture!
Nothing in all the world can match it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Right. Let's get us a key while this
guy is busy catching trichinosis.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Did the couple from before send this?
I may have underestimated them—the
foul rottenness of this meal is truly
a thing beyond all compare!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
And what a feast! I eat and eat and eat,
but there is yet more! Oho ho ho!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text: I found the key, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_000_CUT_.text:
Then let's get out of here quick.
Wouldn't want to interrupt that
guy's dinner.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text: I've brought you a tribute, Warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Rotten meat—and in such great quantities!
Oh, but you are a fine one indeed—
and such dedication deserves a reward.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Oh, you needn't worry yourself.
You must eat first, my lord.
We can discuss rewards later.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Why, I'm liking you more and more!
If only everyone was so thoughtful. But instead, I find myself surrounded by
cretins and fools who simply refuse to
understand or anticipate my needs! Also, this meat is simply divine.
I've never tasted its like before.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
It is in fact from pigs that died
in a plague, my good sir.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
PLAGUEMEAT!? Oho ho ho ho!
How truly succulent!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Cripes, this guy really lives up to his name.
But now that he's busy horfin' down a pile
of putrid pork, what should I do?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Now, my lord, you had mentioned the
possibility of a reward, yes? I'd love the
key to the Dark Castle, if it's not a bother.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Strange... There was an idiot who died trying
to collect all the keys a little while ago.
Are you perhaps associated with that moron?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Well, either way, my key will do you no good
without the other three, so I'll let the other
wardens worry about that while I gorge myself
on this positively mouth-watering meat! The key is yours.
Best of luck, now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_POISON_0.text:
Ah, while your meal was mouth-watering,
I can't simply hand my key over to anyone
who wanders by with diseased meat. Sadly, I suppose there's nothing for it
but to kill you—but this little workout
will make my next meal all the sweeter!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Think there's uncommon food
in this well, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, indeed! In fact, this well will let you
get your hands on food that would never be
found in this world otherwise. Oh, and sometimes you'll find garbage,
though I imagine the Warden of Gluttony
doesn't really care which one he gets.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
This well must connect to other worlds.
Might be worth testing out.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text: Okay, let's give it a shot.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Think I've got something good here.
Time to pull it up.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text: An item? Don't mind if I do.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh yeah, this should keep the
Warden of Gluttony's tum happy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text: I've brought you a tribute, Warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Now THERE'S something I've never seen...
Why, it looks positively delicious!
Give it to me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh ho, but it simply melts in the mouth!
While food is best savored in one's stomach,
I am hardly one to shake a stick at doing so
on the tongue as well. Now then, I believe you've earned
a reward for bringing me something so
unusual and delicious.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
I'd love the key to the Dark Castle,
if it's not a bother.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Do you truly believe this meal was
valuable enough to warrant my key?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Oh, I like you. I didn't think there was
anyone else in this world who understood
food on the same level as myself, but then
you arrived with the soul of a gourmand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Very well, you may have my key. Be aware,
however, it won't do you any good without
the other three—and I don't expect the other
wardens to be so generous as I. But that is their problem! As for myself,
I shall now immerse myself even further
into a world of a succulent gourmet!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_GOOD_FOOD_000.text:
Hubris! Cheek! Impudence!
No meal could possibly be so valuable! Sadly, I suppose there's nothing for it
but to kill you—but this little workout
will make my next meal all the sweeter!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Question for you: why have you got the
Dismal King locked up in the Dark Castle?
Isn't he...I dunno. Your boss?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
And who are you to be asking such things!?
If you would speak with me, manners and protocol
dictate that you must provide tribute in the form
of delicious foodstuffs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You there! Maid! You look terribly familiar...
Were you not the servant of the man who
came here to steal the key to the Dark Castle?
The man we later decapitated?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
My master lives again thanks to the power of
the Dismal King—and this time, we are going
to take the key and use it to release him!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
The Dismal King brought him back?
No. Impossible. Absolutely impossible! What's more, the Dismal King has locked
HIMSELF up in the Dark Castle—we are
simply taking guardianship of the keys
so as to ensure he is not disturbed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
A bald-faced lie! I know the keys have
been scattered and hidden away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Y'know, we could clear this whole mess up
if you just let us chat with the Dismal King,
so maybe just hand the key over and we
can be on our merry way?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I am not in the habit of giving anything
to interlopers who arrive before me
without proper tribute! And so, I propose a challenge.
If you win, I'll give you the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Eh, seems fair so far.
What's the challenge?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
A battle of the bulging belly!
We shall eat and eat and eat,
and the side who eats the most
shall be declared the victor!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
The Warden of Gluttony wants an
EATING contest!? That's just low.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
This is the Tower of Gluttony!
What other challenge would you
expect given our current setting? Oh, and if you lose, your lives will
be most deliciously forfeited to me.
Now...I would have your answer.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: HERO
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Bring on the buffet!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: HERO
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Nah, let's just fight instead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You're on, fella. Better make sure the chefs are
workin' overtime though, because I'm a card-
carrying member of the Clean Plate Club.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: S-such confidence...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Are you certain about this, Master?
Think about who your opponent is!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Yeah, you're not wrong there.
I'm gonna need to prepare, so bring
me somewhere with lots of people.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Um... Okay?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_1.text:
My key was stolen, but no matter. Right now,
I must focus on eating something to heal
the wounds upon my mind and body.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Lots of people live in this town,
but I doubt any of them will be
willing to stand up to the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Yeah, it's hard to fight the man
when the walls of your belly
are knockin' together.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Hey there, folks! So there's a huge feast
happening over at the Tower of Gluttony,
and everyone's welcome to swing by and
eat their fill.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
That pig of a warden is holding
a feast for US? I can't believe it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Sure is—but the whole thing's a first-come,
first-served sorta deal, so you better
hustle your buns on over.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: I'm in!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Me too!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Hey, wait for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Well, this has taken a turn!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ah, welcome! I commend you for standing
and fighting our battle even though it 
is destined to end with you in my belly.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Guess we'll see about that, guy.
Now let the feast of gluttony begin!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Whoooa, look at all that food! I had no
idea the warden had such generosity!
NOW LET ME AT IT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Ho, what are you doing!?
This is a one-on-one battle!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Well now, you never said nothing about that,
fella—but you DID say that 'our lives' would
be forfeit if we lost. That's lives, plural, which
means I've got permission to use a team.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
You deceived me...but it is no matter!
For I am the Warden of Gluttony,
and none can hope to best me on
the battlefield of food!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: This looks amazing!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: I'm gonna eat till I croak!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Hmph! You people are mere food tourists!
A hundred of you filthy urchins could not
outeat true food nobility such as myself!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
This is the first time I've ever eaten
so much, and I'm so happy I could die.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Not me! I want dessert! DESSEEERT!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: My compliments to the chef!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Why not just give up already?
I have barely begun to dine!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
We've only had a hundred folks eat so far,
and I've got 300 more waiting outside for
their turn at the table. You'd better hang
in there so everyone can get their fill!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Y-yes, well, I could eat three TIMES
this amount with...no problem...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Heck, fella, that's why you're
the Warden of Gluttony. But it looks like you're slowing down, maybe?
You might wanna think about throwing in the
napkin, seeing as we've got a hundred folks
ready to go and I haven't taken a bite yet.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I've only...begun to feast...
I...I will devour...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Not good for the old tum to overeat, guy.
I mean, you might be the Warden of Gluttony,
but you've still gotta listen to your body.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Don't make me lau—HURK!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text: Might want to look away for this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
Well, we got the key, but I'm gonna
smell like that guy's upchuck for days.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GLUTTONY_FOOD_BATTLE_0.text:
I smell nothing but your
own magnificence, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I hear you two were married in secret.
Congratulations! From two lives,
a new one is created. But why keep such a
wondrous thing secret?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You didn't want to pay the marriage tax.
Ah, but it's a pity to tarnish the sacred
act of marriage with such behavior. Still, I am a forgiving man. Your marriage
will be considered legal and binding so
long as you pay the tax by this evening.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Um, and by marriage tax,
do you mean...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
One night of service to me, yes.
The bride? The groom? Both? I care not.
You're free to make that decision yourselves.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I COULD order you to do this, as one cannot
oppose the power of a warden. But this service
is sacred, and coercion is an ugly thing that
does not suit me. Think carefully upon your decision.
I shall be waiting.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
And now to decide what kind of service
they shall provide... Oh, just thinking
about it gives me chills! Hsss hsss hsss!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That's the Warden of Lust, Master.
While he tries to hold a polite and
composed facade, his head is filled
with all manner of desirous thoughts. He's also one of the watchtower wardens
who holds a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Fella lives up to his name, I guess.
Still, sounds like I died once trying
to get the key from this guy, so I'd
like to avoid that happening again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text: Guess we just march right in.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Won't learn anything about the key if we don't
talk to the guy, so I'll just tell him we're
there to pay the marriage tax.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Marriage... W-wait, you mean ME!? I mean, US!?
The two of us, a happily married couple!?
That's... Oh, but what am I to do!?
My mind is a complete blank...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text: Just pretending to be married here, so don't go ordering a bunch of flowers. As for what happens then, we'll just play it by ear once we see how this lusty fellow reacts.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
EEEK! Wait, please! We didn't say
anything about running away!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
If you're going to take her,
then just take her already!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yes, just take... Wait, WHAT!?
Are you planning to sacrifice
me so you can escape alone!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, we're not with that Tower of Lust fella;
I'm just trying to get my hands on a key
to the Dark Castle. You happen to know
anything about the Warden of Lust, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
A key to... Wait, are you trying to help
the Dismal King!? Oh, bless you, sir!
If he were back, we'd no longer have to
toil under the cruel yoke of the wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Reproach_Aconitu
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Alas, the Warden of Lust has a truly terrifying
power: when he stares at you with his shining,
snake-like eyes, you've no choice but to do
exactly as he bids of you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Apathetic_Sling
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, except for that dog. You know,
the one who bit him? The Warden held
no sway whatsoever over that animal. That said, I don't wish to think about what
happened to the poor dog afterward, just as
I cannot stand to think about what might
happen to me in a similar situation!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_000_.text:
Okay, so this guy's got the power to make
folks do whatever he says, but it doesn't
seem to work on critters. Thanks for the help, folks—oh, and congrats
on the wedding. Hope you get lots of years
together and they're nothing but humdingers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
Sounds like this hypno fella
is a real handful.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
I agree, although I don't understand
why he didn't just use that power
on the newlyweds.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
He probably gets off on hearing what folks
say while also knowing there's no way they
can refuse him. Real piece of work, this one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, I suppose we should start
looking for a dog.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LUST_HELP_000_CUT_010_.text:
Then look for the key while the pupper
chomps on him? Heck, that might just
be crazy enough to work.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: _NOT_SPECIFIED_

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Hey there, Warden. We've come to
pay our marriage tax.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
What!? I had no idea there were
people out there who might pay
my tax of their own volition!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Er, forgive me. I was so overjoyed to find people
who understand and appreciate the true meaning
of the marriage tax that I couldn't help but
exclaim in surprise. I offer my blessings unto your union, and am
glad you understand that the marriage tax
is a gift from me to the pair of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Appreciate it, fella.
So how do we pay this deal?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Well, perhaps I'll accept my service
from your beautiful bride...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Swell. I'll just wait here then.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Come, my lovely. This way.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Find the key quickly... Please.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: I'm on it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Right then. Where to start?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage on the right.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage on the left.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Passage straight ahead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
...Nope. No key. If I don't find it soon,
Dolores'll be straight up shoot creek.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
...Not here, either. And while I don't think
the warden's the kind of fella to use his
power lightly, Dolores is gonna be in real
trouble if the mood strikes him.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Dang it, the key's nowhere to be found!
The guy must keep it on him.
Better swing by his room.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Now then, my dear, let me see
that beautiful body of yours.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Beautiful? Me? Oh, no sir!
Just a plain old body over here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Why, that's not true at all!
The body of each and every
bride is a beautiful thing.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
So you're saying I'm exactly the same as all
the other brides!? You brought me all the
way up here and THAT'S what you tell me!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I... Er, I mean... Of course not!
You are wholly unique and special!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Ugh! This woman is a real pain.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Perhaps a drink, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Don't mind if I do!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: You must feel better now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Oh, that was just delicious.
I'll have another, please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Er... I mean, of course!
Have as many as you like!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: This one's not normal...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I did not realize you were the
troublesome type, my dear one.
I prefer a more...obedient bride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Well, if I'm not what you're looking for,
I suppose I'll just chalk this all up to
irreconcilable differences and head home.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
All right, this has gone on long enough!
I command you to gaze into my eyes
and beg for my favor!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
No way! Not interested in staring
into your beady little eyes, mister!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Ah, but closing your eyes is futile...
You cannot escape my power...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: M-Master...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Oh, but I can escape it. I very, very much can.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Henchman_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Halt, stranger! I'm under strict
orders not to let anyone into the
warden's private chambers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Hey, thanks for the tip, guy.
Wasn't sure I was in the right place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: What's with all the commotion?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Dolores! You okay!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Yes, Master, I'm perfectly fine!
Did you find the key to the Dark Castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
The key to the... Hsss hsss hsss! Oh, but it's
all coming together now. I KNEW I recognized
this bride—you're that maid from before!
But your master is said to be deceased.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
By the power of the Dismal King has he
been returned to life—and we'll be taking
that key so we can aid in our lord's return!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
Hsss hsss hsss! Oh, how VERY interesting!
But let us discuss this like civilized people—
what do you need the key for? Depending on your answer,
I just might let you have it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: I'm looking for something.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: This is for Dolores, ya bum!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I'm looking for something, and I think
the Dismal King knows where it is.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
How utterly fascinating. This sounds far
more fun than any service which that maid
or bride or...whatever she is might offer.
You may take the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text:
I'm quite looking forward to what you
will encounter in the Dark Castle...
Now begone before I change my mind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_000_C.text: Just who IS that man?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_100_C.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_DOLORES_100_C.text:
I'm surprised the man lost his temper
over my treatment of a maid. Who IS he?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: _NOT_SPECIFIED_

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Is your plan to try and
catch a wolf, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Well, a wolf is probably more effective than
a dog, but anything that makes a big fuss
at the Tower of Lust should be good.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Hey there, sport. You heard a wolf
howling around here recently?
I'm looking to catch one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Sorry, you want to CATCH it?
That sounds sort of impossible.
Also, no. I haven't heard one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
That's a shame. See, 'cause I was hoping to
sic a wolf on the Warden of Lust and then use
that time to find the key to the Dark Castle.
But yeah, that's probably a nutty idea.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Wait, hold on. You're planning to release
the Dismal King? Let me help you!
I've got something I need to ask him!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
I'd be happy to have the help, bud,
but what is it that you do, exactly?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
I'm a wolf tamer, actually—so if you
need one brought to the Tower of Lust,
I am your man.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Appreciate it, guy. We'll head over,
so just bring the pup when you're ready.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: _NOT_SPECIFIED_
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: _NOT_SPECIFIED_

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Hey, guy. Where's the wolf?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, don't worry.
It'll come as soon as I call.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
One of you two grooms will
provide service to me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Looks like I'm up.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: No wolf yet?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Oh, don't worry.
It'll come as soon as I call.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Now let me see that well-muscled
body of yours, groom.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
You know, I'd heard the Warden of Lust
was a man of rare beauty, but you're
just sort of...dull. Also tacky.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Hsss hsss hsss! Not yet aware of my charms,
are you? Go on then, look into my eyes.
You will see how truly beautiful I am.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Mmm, sorry, but no. The Warden of Lust may
be beautiful, but you aren't him—you must
be some kind of body double or the like.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
But why!? Why isn't my power working!?
You're just an ordinary man! You're nothing!
What is your secret!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Well, since you're an impostor, you better
just give me the key to the Dark Castle.
I mean, we can't have a nobody like you
carrying something like that around.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Excuse me!? That key is proof that
I am the true Warden of Lust!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Which is why you're gonna
hand it over! AROOOOOO!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Damnation! You're a werewolf!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Dang it, the key's nowhere to be found!
The guy must keep it on him.
Better swing by his room.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: I've got the key. Let's go.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Henchman_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: Stop right there!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
You take the key and skedaddle on
out of the tower, bud. I've got this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
Make sure you take me to the
Dark Castle so the Dismal King
can save me. Don't forget!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text: You got it. I swear.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_LUST_WOLF_000_CUT_.text:
How the heck did that guy manage
to get the key on his own?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is the Month of Slumber, my good man—
yet a little bird tells me you have been
laboring the days away instead of sleeping
as you should be. Why is this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I'm sorry, milord! It's just that...
Well, we're out of food and we're hungry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text: Are you some kind of fool? You're hungry because you're laboring! Why, oh why, does my sacred rest have to be disturbed by packs of idiots like this? It! Is! So! Infuriating!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
But very well! If you desire to toil so badly,
I'll put you to work in the underground mines.
Your shift runs from midnight to midnight,
every day, until you are dead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, no! Please! I'll never work again!
I'll be a regular layabout! Please!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
There can be no clemency for one
who disturbs my slumber. *yaaawn*

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
That is the Warden of Sloth, Master.
He's truly lazy, but doesn't mind
putting others to work. He's also one of the watchtower wardens
with a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Fella lives up to his name, I guess.
Still, sounds like I died once trying
to get the key from this guy, so I'd
like to avoid that happening again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: Let's help that guy out first.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: Guess we just march right in.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text: Of course, Master. Let's do that.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
Of course, Master. Let's do thaaa...
Er, wait. Why? If we just 'march in,' 
you're going to get killed again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
If this guy does nothing but sack out,
it should be pretty easy to take
the key from him, eh?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_SIN_000_CUT_010_.text:
I think you're right, Master.
Let's go steal it at once!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
So explain something to me here, slugger:
what's so bad about working during this
whole 'Month of Slumber' deal?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
The Warden of Sloth has done us a great service
by establishing a month in which none may toil.
The wasting of this blessing is an act that
cannot be permitted to stand!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Okay, sure. But if a guy DID want
to work, what's the harm?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
If a person is so insistent on besmirching
the Month of Slumber, they may pursue their
precious work in the underground mines. Those who wish to rest may sleep.
Those who wish to work will labor.
Such is the compassion of the Warden!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
What? No! You have to help me!
That's why you're here, right?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Well, it'd be nice if you could help me
in return, bud. Like if you knew one of
the warden's weaknesses, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Uhhh... Sure I do! I know 'em all!
Now help me already!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: You can't possibly trust this guy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text: I could use the info. Let's save him.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Henchman_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
Come then, my pretty! Oh, but you will
SO enjoy the underground mines!
Aha! Aha! Aaah ha ha ha ha!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_000.text:
I vote we march straight into the
Tower of Sloth and settle this deal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
All right there, fella.
Let's hear about these weaknesses.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
The Warden of Sloth has no weaknesses!
And even if he did, there's no way a lowborn
oaf like me would know anything.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text: Let's send this liar to the mines.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
Heck, that barely counts as information,
but I suppose it's about the only thing
we're gonna get out of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
In that case, it's time to take my leave.
Oh, and while I don't know what you're
planning, I wish you the best of luck!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SLOTH_HELP_000_CUT_010.text:
I suppose I should have warned them that
entering the tower will make them sleepy...
but after the way they just threatened me,
I think they've earned a little suffering!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Even the guard's asleep.
The Month of Slumber, indeed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Sorta what I'd expect from a fella who
serves the Warden of Sloth, actually.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
*yaaawn* Forgive me, Master...
I'm getting a bit tired...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
*yaaawn* Yeah, I'm yawnin' up a storm.
Let's focus up and find that warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: I love how you play dirty, Master.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
At this rate, we're both going
to fall asleep.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Okay, NOW it's surprise attack time.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: We can take the key now, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
Swell. Let's grab it and get out
of this dang narcolepsy palace.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Cripes! He's not hurt at all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
You were a fool to attack me in my sleep,
for it is when the Warden of Sloth is at
his most powerful—and by that, I mean
I am completely invincible!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: Too bad you're awake now, bud!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text: All right, make with the key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_NOTHING_000_.text:
I had no reason to fight for true.
Now back to sleep for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
So the warden doesn't like loud noises,
eh? I think we know what to do here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: WAR WITH THE WARDEN! WAKE UP SLOTH! WAR WITH THE WARDEN! I PLEDGE MY TROTH! DEATH AND BLOOD AND PUS AND PAIN! NOW YOUR MIND HAS GONE INSANE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Gyaaa! What is this horrific sound!?
This death growl in my head!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: WAR WITH THE WARDEN! GO TO HELL, SLOTH! WAR WITH THE WARDEN! I'M YOUR NEW BOSS! SKULLS AND ICHOR AND GRAVES AND RATS! EVERYONE HATES A BUREAUCRAT! WAR WITH THE WARDEN! BODY IN PAIN! WAR WITH THE WARDEN! SOUL IN TWAIN! SWORDS AND SKIN AND GUTS AND BILE! NOW YOUR CORPSE WILL I DEFILE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
The goddess of death herself has come!
My soul is being torn from my body!
And yet I burn to hear more! More!
MOOOOOOOOOOOORE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: Guess so. Now let's grab that key.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
Looks like your singing
woke up his minions.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text: Did you like my singing, Master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
I hope someday you'll hear
me sing my song of love.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_000_CUT.text:
If you liked that, I bet you'll enjoy this
death metal medley even more!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
Leave that to me. If it'll get us a key to
the Dark Castle, I will spare no effort.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
Wait, so you're a wolf tamer?
You follow me here on purpose, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
I'll call a wolf, so just wait for me
outside the tower. Oh, and don't
worry—I'll get that key for you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
A wolf? Blast, this is no dream.
Time for this bat to fly!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
The Warden of Sloth hates wolves,
apparently. That's good to know.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_SLOTH_LOUD_WOLF_00.text:
How'd a wolf even get into the tower?
I didn't see a dang thing go through
the front gates...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
As this month's grand tournament winner,
your prize is a one-on-one battle with me!
NOW COME AT ME, SON!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lazy_Crutch
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
B-but you're the Warden, milord!
There's no way I can beat you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
One blow? Seriously!? How could a weakling like
that have possibly won the grand tournament!?
Who in the blazes is running that thing!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Henchman_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Er, me, milord. But the thing is,
we don't have many participants
because no one wants to face y—

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text: Then it's your job to FIND SOME!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Lasted two blows, did ya?
I sure know how to pick 'em! ...Well, crap. I let my anger get the best
of me, and now I'm down a lackey. Again.
Grrr, but that really fries my eggs!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That is the Warden of Wrath. He's constantly 
furious, and ever in search of intense combat.
He's also one of the watchtower wardens
with a key to the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Fella lives up to his name, I guess.
Still, sounds like I died once trying
to get the key from this guy, so I'd
like to avoid that happening again.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Correct as always, Master!
So what do you propose?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
We gotta fight him. Nothing else
is gonna fly with this guy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That's... Huh. It's not like you to fight
someone so obsessed with battle head-on.
Couldn't we try to take advantage of his
short fuse or something?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RAGE_SIN_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Way ahead of you there. We'll find a way
to duke it out WITHOUT getting right up
in this fella's grill.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Time to throw down, guy!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It's about damn time somebody interesting
showed up around here! Let's just hope
you aren't all talk.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
So if I beat you, you hand over the key
to the Dark Castle. Square deal?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Agreed. But if I win,
you hand over your LIFE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Looks like you're stronger than I thought.
I'll do you a solid and actually put some
effort into this next one.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: I'll step my game up too.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Nah, we're done here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Dolores is right, better not to fight this guy head on.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Running away, is it? Good! I love hunting
down fleeing prey—and I'll hunt ya to the
ends of the damn world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Takin' off? Good! Get stronger,
then come back! More fun for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
No, yeah. I'm thinking it might be
a good idea to get a key from one
of the other watchtowers first.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
You're making this a good workout
for me. The key you seek is within
that flame, son.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
It's the fire of my spirit—the fire
of rage. And if you want the key,
you'll have to put out my fire!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Just call me the fireman.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: This isn't working. Gotta go!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
My flame grows fiercer! My spirit burns!
I'm grateful to you, but we're not done!
The fight goes OOOOOON!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: I'm gonna break that spirit, pops.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Your flame got a little weaker.
Starting to worry that you could lose?
*sniff* Is that FEAR I smell?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Fear? Bah! My heart contains only rage—
rage at the fact I haven't crushed your
damn bones into dust!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Not done... I'm not done...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: Your spirit's accepted defeat.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: I'll take that key now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
Hey, but good fight, champ.
Let's do it again sometime.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text:
A good...fight? Well, I suppose the fires of
my fury may have been somewhat calmed.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_FIRE_000_CUT_.text: You... You're—!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
I bet we can use this well
for something, maybe.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
How about we hide in it and wait
for Mr. Bad Bull to run past us?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Yep, that's one option.
We got any better ones?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Damn! He caught up to us
while we were thinking.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
No! The hunt can't end this quickly!
Keep running! Make this FUN!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
I know you think you caught us there,
guy, but are you sure this is gonna
work out like you think?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Sounds like you're taking me lightly.
Last mistake you'll ever make, son!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Guy fell into the well.
Juuust like we planned it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Dolores
