SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
You're amazing, Master! You dodged him
AND looked awesome doing it!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_ALL_RAGE_WELL_000_CUT_.text:
Sure did. Now let's go look for the key
in the tower while we can.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
We're gonna face a real humdinger
of a power when we open this door.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
Best make sure everything's ready
to go before we break the seal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_LITHOGRAM_GIVEUP_000_C.text:
No need for worry so long
as we're prepared!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
This Dark Castle deal is different
than I was expecting somehow.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! I have fulfilled
my oath and thrown wide the gates of the
Dark Castle! Reveal yourself to us now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Looks like nobody's home. I mean, if there's
a fella called the 'Dismal King' here, we'd
definitely feel it. This place is deserted.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
To think there would be people stupid
enough to open this gate...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
And now the truth is known: you'd hoped
to meet the Dismal King, but found only
an empty castle. I hope you are happy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Yes indeed! The king is gone, and not even
we wardens know where he might be.
Perhaps he fled this life. Perhaps he died.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
We're the damn wardens of the watchtowers!
And while we've taken charge of them from
the king, his absence is still troubling.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
If it were to become known that our lord
has abandoned his castle, the people of
this world would no longer heed us.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
But if they believe we have sealed him away,
they also believe the four of us possess
a strength greater than his own.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Oh, but I'm breaking out in goosebumps
just thinking about what punishment
awaits these interlopers!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Don't worry: the four wardens of the
watchtowers will make sure there are
always pretty flowers on your grave!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
We rid the world of the wardens,
but that doesn't get us any closer
to finding the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
I'm FREE! And so is all of Yomi!
Oh, thank you, Master! Thank you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Then you should enjoy
the heck out of it. As for me, I was hopin' to have the Dismal
King tell me where I could find a spirit,
but since that didn't work out, I've clearly
still got a bit of work to do here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
This is no time for me to relax, Master.
I wish to continue serving at your side,
and also know where we might find a spirit!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_NOKING_00.text:
Seriously? Should've just asked
you right from the jump.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: So is that the Dismal King?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: He's a bit different from how I imagined. ...Okay, a lot different. ...Okay, completely different. But yes. That's him.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Hear me, O Dismal King! I have fulfilled
my oath and thrown wide the gates of the
Dark Castle! Please grant my reward now!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
This doesn't exactly scream 'reward,'
does it? Probably time to head out.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: The gate's closed!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Oh, but you worked so very hard to meet
the Dismal King! Stay awhile, friends!
Bask in his presence!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King eventually took that form
after repeatedly devouring his subordinates.
Alas, one must always take care not to overeat.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Eventually, the wardens of the seven
watchtowers joined forces to seal
the Dismal King away in his castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
And although three towers and their
wardens fell to ruin, we remaining
four kept watch over the seal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Do enjoy your little tryst
with the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Go find somewhere to hide, Dolores.
I'm gonna send this fella packing!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Could it be?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: I'll lend a hand.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Do it! Destroy the Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Keep going, son! Don't give up!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King is no more...
Time for a nap!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Today calls for a banquet!
We'll all eat until we burst!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You people can do as you want,
but I will rule over this castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Not so fast there, snake boy!
I'M the new lord of this world!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
A beef-brain like you ruling Yomi?
What a nightmare.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Indeed, a lord must be graceful
and kind—just as I am.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You fellas all forget that we're the ones
who actually took out the Dismal King?
Didn't even thank us, which, rude.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: ...Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King is dead.
I know we did our best,
but I still can't believe it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Chin up, there. Lots of things in life
don't go quite the way you'd hoped—
doesn't mean you did anything wrong.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Oh, I'm totally fine! After all,
I've got YOU, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: I'm not your master.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: You sure do!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
How could you say something so heartless
when I'm trying so hard to act cheerful?
I hate you, Master! I hate you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Well, guess it's better like this in the
long run. But now it's spirit-hunting time,
and I think I know just who to ask...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Hey there! You know where I might
find a spirit or two around here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
You were strong enough to defeat even the
four wardens of the watchtowers—which means
you might be strong enough to seal away
the Dismal King's power!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Yes, we've been searching for powerful
people such as yourselves who might
fight the king in our stead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Now hold on just a minute there, fellas.
I'm not so sure I want you pushing your
problems on us here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Ah, but in reality, YOU are the ones who are
actually facing the dark power of the king—
and if you fight, you will have the full
support of the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Well, it's me or him, I guess.
Go hide someplace, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Time to RAGE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: A little snack never hurts!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Let's ease down now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Leave this to me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
The Dismal King turned
into a baby!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
It appears his power has been reset.
Good! This should return the flow
of darkness to normal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Well, heck! I thought you four imprisoned
the Dismal King so you could run around
doing whatever you wanted, but...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
WRONG! The watchtower wardens are
the guardians of the Dark Castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Until the king returns to his former self,
let us entrust his care to the maid here.
I assume she will be fine with this.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Does that work for you, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
If it is your wish, Master,
then I will give my all to
raising the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Hey, so thanks for... Well, heck.
Thanks for everything, I guess.
You've really done a lot for me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text: Are you leaving, Master!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
Yep. Turns out your master's real
objective is to track down spirits.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
In that case, you should begin
your search in the tower ruins.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_MONSTER_0.text:
See? Everything. Heck, Dolores,
you really are the best.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
So this might sound like a dumb question,
but why the cripes is there a baby sitting
all alone in the Dismal King's castle?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Ooo, you're a happy wittle baby!
Yes you are!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Finally, I am shed of that place.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
You two were the ones who brought
me outside of the barrier, yes?
You have my gratitude.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Hold on just a second there, guy.
You the Dismal King, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Those who address me usually take a knee
or otherwise show deference, but in light
of your recent good work, I'll overlook it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
The barrier on that castle sealed
my power away—hence why I took
on the form of a baby.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
And getting beyond the barrier turned you
into a teenager? Though I'm guessin'
that's not where this ends...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Of course not. If I can pass beyond the barrier
formed by the watchtowers, I will regain my
true form—but alas, said barrier spans the
entirety of Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: So why not just leave Yomi?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text: Is such a thing even possible?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Sure. Oh, but first, I need your help
with a little errand. See, there are
powerful spirits in this world, and I'm
guessing you know where to find 'em.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
A mere trifle. If you wish, I can summon
a spirit of incredible ability from right
here in this castle.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Heck, that's swell. Let's head to the
graveyard, summon a spirit, and see
about swinging by another world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_BABY_000_.text:
Heck, that's swell. Let's head to the
well, summon a spirit, and see about
swinging by another world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Boy howdy, I feel something big!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: It is the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Uh, Dolores? You all right th—

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hear me, O King! I, the Warden of Pride,
have fulfilled my sacred vow! Among all
other wardens, I alone have proven worthy
to stand at your side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: What the cripes is this!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
I did not think you would make it here,
Warden of Pride. Your virtue, after all,
is pride—the selfsame quality which makes
you unable to cooperate with others.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
In your arrogance, you played at being queen,
and gloated overmuch of how you surpassed
all other wardens. But I am the Dismal King!
I need no one at my side!
So while you will never admit to such,
you are not worthy to be my queen.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Still, you have my praise for all you have
done up until this point, for I know it must
have been most arduous for one of your
haughty arrogance... Now begone.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Begone? BEGONE? How DARE you say so to me! You, who were trembling in this castle like a miserable cur until I set you free! But fine. If you can't see my true glory, I'll just get rid of you like I did all of the other wardens!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Well, this is a deal. Heck, I've got no reason to
scrap with the Dismal King. I didn't have a reason
to fight the wardens either, really—I just did that
because you thought I was your old mas...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Oh, cripes. You didn't think that. You were just pretending to be loyal so I'd get neck-deep into this deal and agree to fight the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Not quite. The Warden of Pride—the TRUE Warden
of Pride—coveted the seat of queen and betrayed
the other wardens. But before she could kill them,
she herself was ended instead. I saw this as a good thing overall,
and replaced the warden with this maid.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
But only after entering this castle did she
fully complete the task I had implanted deep
in her mind. So you see, it was not she who
deceived you, but I.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Enough! I am the Warden of Pride,
and I refuse to stand by and let you
claim you somehow manipulated me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Hah!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Urk!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Nnngh...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Now then. As I know you would never
wish for mercy, I will permit you
to perish along with your pride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Whoa, slow down there, champ!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
I'M Dolores' master, and I'm not gonna let
you strut around makin' all the decisions.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
This is no longer the maid you knew as Dolores,
but the Warden of Pride—and what becomes of
her is for the Dismal King alone to decide.
Now remove yourself from my sight!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hmm... It would seem your determination is
not borne of mere arrogance. Given this,
perhaps it is better for this warden to
serve her master as a maid after all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
M-Master...? I think I...blacked out.
Oof, and everything hurts...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Turns out the Dismal King here
was just saying what a good job
you did with this whole deal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
He...he said that about ME!?
Oh, but that's wonderful!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Now begone, the both of you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Hold on there, fella. I've got a request.
There are powerful spirits somewhere
here in Yomi. Know anything about that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
If spirits are your desire, I can
summon them for you. Behold!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
You continue to impress.
Now begone for good and all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Be well, milord!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
I see that one was too strong.
Perhaps this one, then?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text:
Another failure? There must have been some
misstep in the fight before. Regardless,
I suggest you take whatever matters remain
to you and handle them far away from me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.speaker: Siugnas_Darkking
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_000.text: Now begone.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Well, look who finally figured it out...
Oh, but my performance was absolutely
RIVETING, wouldn't you say? And while it wouldn't have been difficult
for me to kill the other wardens alone,
I had to save my strength to topple the
Dismal King here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
And as for you, my king...
Bow your head and beg forgiveness!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
So I guess you were planning
to kill that guy all along?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Kill him? I wanted to be his QUEEN!
None but I possess power and beauty
enough to stand at his side!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Well, looks like the Warden of Pride
has become the new Dismal King.
Good on you, I guess? But hey, got a favor to ask: there are said
to be powerful spirits here in Yomi, and I'm
hoping you can tell me where they are. I mean, considering everything I did for
you in this whole deal, I figure you're
probably okay throwing me a bone.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Guess I'm done here, then.
See you around.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
Wait, no! Don't just leave!
The spirits... The spiiirits...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
The spirits are yours if you fight me!
Yes, that's it! Fight me for them!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
That's some hot nonsense right there.
I'll just go find 'em on my own.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_100.text:
No! I must grant your wish!
I won't stand for any alternatives!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
Seems like the spirits I'm
looking for are here, but...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
You think you can win against me, Master?
The one who took down the Dismal King?
You should be more worried for your LIFE!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: UI
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text: You acquired a wood spirit's power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: UI
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text: You acquired a fire spirit's power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: UI
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text: You acquired a metal spirit's power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: UI
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text: You acquired a water spirit's power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_CASTLE_FINAL_PRIDE_110.text:
Well, I'll be... Dolores really DID
become the Dismal King. Well, I got the spirit power I needed,
so I guess this is goodbye.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
Feels like I just met Dolores
here yesterday...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_PRIDE_000.text:
...Nah. Must be hearin' things.
So long, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
The Tower of Wrath seems different.
What's the deal with that?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
With the Dismal King released, Master,
you are now seeing Yomi's true form—
as well as the true forms of the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, that's different, all right.
Must be the true Warden of Wrath.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I thought a coward like you might steal
treasures in the Dark Castle, but you went
and released the Dismal King instead...
AND NOW YOU'RE GONNA PAY!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Same old Wrath on the inside, though.
But fine, guy. You wanna dance?
I'll give you everything I got.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Stand down, Warden—unless you are truly
so ignorant of the power I wield?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Rage
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, I know it well, my king...which is why
I'm gonna stick you back in that castle
and make you a damn baby again!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I must say, you do impress.
It's no mean thing to bring down
the strongest of all wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Guy was probably still hurting from
his little trip down the well.
Can't let our guard down, though.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
When a wise person wishes to avoid
direct conflict, they employ a detour.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, yes... I sense the presence of some
of my thralls, faint though it may be.
Perhaps they have escaped the wary eyes
of the wardens by hiding in the city? Still, I know they will work themselves
to the bone and beyond for my sake.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I suspect we may also find places where
I can summon the spirits you seek.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RAGE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So it's all up to me now?
Heck, fella. That's a lot of pressure.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Not to talk out of turn or anything, but are you
sure your followers will 'work to the bone and
beyond' for you? Heck, folks in this town might
not have what it takes to oppose the wardens.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
They cannot disobey my words,
and would never betray me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Whatever you say.
You're the king, after all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Full glad am I to come face-to-face
with you, my thralls. I must venture across our lands without drawing
the attention of the wardens, that I might
regain my true strength. As such, I would have
you travel ahead and draw their eyes from us.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, I'll be danged—they're actually
doing it. Love to know how you pulled
that one off, guy.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text: Care to try it for yourself?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_TOWN_000_CUT_000_.text:
Nope. I'm not much for obeying orders
if it means putting myself in the grave.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
There were once a full seven watchtowers in Yomi,
each symbolizing one of the virtues of darkness:
pride, greed, envy, wrath, sloth, gluttony,
and lust. Yet some have now been lost forever.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
These ruins—where the Tower of Pride
once stood—are one such instance. Indeed, you served the Warden of Pride,
maid. Do you remember this?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
I have a vague recollection of working here
a long while ago, but it's...fuzzy. I think it
was from a time before I knew my master?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.text:
But if you say it is so, then it must be.
How incredible that you might know so much
about even a base maid like me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_RUIN_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends. I have waited long and long for a chance
to hunt the Dismal King, and so followed
you when I heard you left his lair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I pray you will stay out of my way.
This will be best for all.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: Sorry, bud. He's under my guard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: Yeah, no. I need his power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text: You're more fool than I imagined!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Tough beans, chump. Now knock this off
and go find some other hobby.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Master! The Dismal King is
surrounded by fiends!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Fear not, for they are my servants,
and will allow us to avoid the
watchtowers. Now hurry aboard.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_0.text:
You sure are living up to the hype,
fella. Thanks for the lift.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
You will find your praise unwarranted;
this is far from a gentle ride.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text: You had this thing all ready!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
How could you make such
a cruel choice, Master!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_1.text:
That hunter looked like a pretty tough
guy—and since I've already got my hands
on a spirit, I figured I'd avoid the risk. Plus, c'mon. Any fella that says he's a
king can sure as shoot protect himself.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_2.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_FLY_000_CUT_000_2.text:
Oh, and this is also the end of pretending
to be your master. Thanks for the help.
Maybe I'll see you around.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
It's always like this: overly indulging
in sloth always leads to the worst of
all possible outcomes. I can't believe you were enough of an idiot
to take the Dismal King out of his castle!
I really should have taken you more 
seriously when first we met...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Look, bud, this doesn't really concern you—
especially since you've got your true form
back and all. Why not just call it a day
and go take a nap?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text: True form? Are you half asleep!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
Do as he bids, Warden: close the gates
of your tower and go to sleep. Or do
you wish to be subjected to endless
days without rest once more?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Lord_Sloth
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
I have a better idea: why don't YOU
go back to the Dark Castle and sleep
as a peaceful little baby? Such sleep is a supreme pleasure only babies
might experience...and it would be a waste
to casually toss such a thing so aside!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
So I guess the wardens don't realize
their forms have changed, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
That's because they haven't
changed—Yomi has.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
So what do you intend to do when
you get all your power back, guy?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_000_CUT_000.text:
You are not of this land;
my actions do not concern you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text: Eh, we better take him out.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text:
You are more given to fighting
than I first imagined.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_100_CUT_000.text:
The path cleared for us by my thralls
has been closed. We have no choice
but to fight our way through.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_200_CUT_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_SLOTH_200_CUT_000.text:
We already avoided this with my flying
conveyance. There is no need to return
to the Tower of Sloth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_100_CUT_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lust is freedom, and such a thing runs counter
to command by a regent. Yet because we live in
the world of darkness, we have been ruled by
a king of it. What a contradiction it is.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Lust is true darkness, which means we have no
need of a king. Even with the seven watchtowers
reduced to four, we still managed to oppose
your cruel reign and seal you away.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
This form is the true darkness.
The true Yomi.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
I get what you're saying there, guy, but
you don't seem to understand what's
actually IN its true form right now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
Cast aside your freedom, Warden, for its
lack creates value from desire—and that
is from whence darkness is born.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
It is you who should cast freedom aside,
for the Dismal King ought be the least
liberated of all!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.text:
So when you were a baby, you had freedom
from having to be the Dismal King?
Heck, that must've been swell.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Alas, it is too late. In the end,
I am the only remaining warden.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Not to overstep, but maybe it'd be better
to go back to a life of eating whatever you
wanted and just forgetting about this whole
Dismal King deal? Heck, I know I'd like a life of
eating like a pig and forgetting
all my troubles, eh?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Indeed, if I could live that life,
I would be content—though
'like a pig' takes it a bit far.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Yet I cannot, for if the Dismal King's
rule is restored, I will be forced to eat
for his sake once more, and all will
again taste as ashes in my mouth.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Warden, covet life. You need no purpose.
A reason for living is unnecessary.
Simply hungering for life is the duty
of all subjects of the dark.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
I just want to eat lots of delicious food!
To savor it and not simply throw it down
my gullet like an unthinking machine!
Will you not even allow me that much!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
If you ask me, life seems tough
for the subjects of the dark.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_010_CUT_.text:
Compared to the toil of their king,
the wardens and their brethren might
as well be sleeping through existence.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
I eat and eat, but still desire more.
Yet when someone tells me I MUST eat, 
I no longer want to. This is what the
presence of the Dismal King means!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
You became a pig because you ate whatever
you wanted. Isn't it about time you think
about showing some restraint?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Eating all one wants is our natural state.
Should doing that cause me to become a pig,
then a pig I shall be.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Eat, Warden. Eat greedily. Such is your
duty as one of the subjects of the dark.
Eat without rest. Eat without pause.
Devote yourself wholly to the act.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Lord_Gluttony
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
No! I don't want that! That's exactly what
makes me not want to eat! So I'm going to
make YOU eat, and eat, and eeeat!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GLUTTONY_000_CUT_.text:
Cripes, guy, I see why they
call you the Dismal King.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text: It seems I'm the only one left.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
This is pretty much the end of the wardens' rule,
so why not give up and ask the Dismal King for
forgiveness? I mean, heck, you're halfway there
already so far as I can tell.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Forgiveness? There is no such word in the
Dismal King's lexicon. And I also do not wish
it, for desire is unforgivable by nature.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
We seven wardens staked our existence on the
unforgivable act of sealing away the king.
Setting aside the three towers that are lost,
how can any of us seek forgiveness?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ask for my forgiveness, Warden.
The Dismal King alone can grant
you clemency. So ask.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
An invitation so sweet I am seized with the
desire to fall to my knees and kiss your feet.
Indeed, I would entrust my entire body to you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Lord_Lust
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
...But I cannot, for you will simply kick me
while I am on my knees begging forgiveness.
For you are the Dismal King, and even if I
desire you, such lust can never be satisfied.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
Y'know, you look like a normal kid to me,
but everyone keeps treating you like a
big shot. Do the wardens see something
in you that I don't, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_LUST_010_CUT_000_.text:
You have poor eyes. Nothing more.
Do not trouble yourself over it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
We've arrived. And you claim we can
reach the world outside Yomi from here?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
So long as you're with me, yep.
Should be doable.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Then let us hurry.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
That will not come to pass, for it is
your fate to be hunted down by me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Hey, hands off the king, fella!
Who the heck even are you?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends. I have waited a long time for a chance
to hunt the Dismal King, and so followed
you when I heard you left his lair.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I was worried those awful wardens might get
him first, so I appreciate your safeguarding
him all this way. Thanks to you, my hunt will
surely prove a great success!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
And what exactly are you hoping to accomplish
by taking the Dismal King out of this world?
He lacks anything but the power to bring about
darkness, and his presence benefits none. Instead, let me take him. In this way,
at least my employer and I will benefit.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I didn't protect him all this time for
your sake, pal, and I don't much care
for the way you crept up on us. So here's the deal: you let him go,
and we'll see where it goes from there.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
You must think me a proper fool!
But no, I'll not let this chance
slip through my fingers.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Bah! Nothing will be settled by standing
about staring daggers at each other!
So very well: I will hear your terms.
Begin the negotiation.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Hey, you might be antsy to get this
over with, but a little delay is nothing
to the Dismal King—and the second I see
my chance, I'm gonna take him back.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Damnable cur!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
I have not the patience for such!
I'd rather risk getting killed by you
than risk the king escaping!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: What the!? My leg!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Damn you, Dismal King!
You've risen the dead from their graves!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
The dead are surrounding us
as well, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Damn it all—and damn YOU,
Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: The king okay there?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Milord!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: ...Oh. He's just sleeping.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
You know, that hunter guy may have a point:
I'm starting to wonder if it's a good idea
to take the Dismal King out of here. I mean, heck! With the wardens gone,
maybe he'd actually be able to live
in this world just fine.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Master, I...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Can you take care of him, Dolores?
Will you do that for me?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
If you ask it of me, I will do so gladly.
And in truth, I would be most happy
to serve the Dismal King himself.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Then go ahead and do that, Dolores.
And...thank you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text:
Farewell, Master!
I'll never forget you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Now then...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_000_CUT.text: Let's go, milord.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I'm relieved you managed to get past all
those villainous wardens; you would have
faced defeat had you fought them head-on
like an honest fool. You also have my thanks for getting the king
here safely—it was impressive work. And thanks
to that work, my hunt for the Dismal King will
now prove a great success.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I didn't bring him here to make you feel all warm
and fuzzy, guy; he promised to help me find spirits
if I kept him safe, and I can't protect Miyako City
with power I achieve through betrayal.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Verbal negotiations are concluded.
Now let my strength speak for me!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
My prey is the Dismal King alone.
I bid you farewell.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
That hunter really did it...
He captured the Dismal King... Oh, but this is the end of Yomi!
I don't know what I should do...

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I'm real sorry I couldn't protect that fella,
Dolores. And while I know I might not be
much of a master, you wanna come with
me anyway?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
I would go anywhere so long as
I can be by your side, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Then let's get the heck out
of this world already.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Tough luck, bud.
Your hunt ends here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Thank cripes that's finally over...
Well? You ready to go there, guy?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
You have done well to aid me,
maid. Live well.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
Y'know, it might be handy to have a maid
around—plus, I bet Dolores would love to
look after you. Right, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
All right. In that case,
into the grave with us!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_100_CUT.text:
All right. In that case,
into the well with us!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.text:
I still haven't gotten my hands
on a dang spirit.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.text:
Then I will summon one for you.
Do finish this quickly, would you?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_GRAVEYARD_010_CUT.text:
Yes, well done. Now hurry up
and take me to another world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, please! I ask that you hear
my request, O Dismal King!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh hey, it's the wolf tamer guy.
He helped us rescue you.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
What is your request, werewolf? I pray you
will not ask to be freed from your plight, 
for how could I, the Dismal King, permit
you to cast away your innate dark power?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Wait, so he actually BECAME the wolf?
Holy smokes, it all makes sense now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
I can hide nothing from you, milord:
I do wish to end my time as a werewolf.
I know this to be a wish unbecoming one
of the dark, but ask it of you anyway.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
Then I offer two paths: continue living
as a werewolf, or die and be free of it.
Make your decision.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_BABY_WOLF_000_CUT_000_.text:
It is a wise decision to continue in
my service as a subject of the dark.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_140_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_140_CUT_010_000.text:
Boy howdy, this spirit looks like a real
tough customer. Think you can summon
one that's a little weaker, maybe?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_140_CUT_010_010.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_140_CUT_010_010.text:
Such an adjustment is impossible.
If that is your wish, you must go
to a place where the power of the
dark is not as strong.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_140_CUT_010_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_140_CUT_010_020.text:
Gotcha. Well, if we find a good spot
before we head on out, I'm counting
on you to summon another spirit.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_110_CUT_000_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_110_CUT_000_000.text:
I can summon the weakest of all spirits
in this place. Will that suffice?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_110_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_110_CUT_000_010.text:
Guess I'll let you know once I see it.
But sure, go ahead.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_120_CUT_000_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_120_CUT_000_000.text:
I can summon a spirit of common
strength here. Will that suffice?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_130_CUT_000_000.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_130_CUT_000_000.text:
I can summon a spirit of considerable
strength here. Will that suffice?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_100_CUT_010_000.text: All right, I got some spirit power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Young_King
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_100_CUT_010_010.text:
Then if your errand is finished,
I ask you to hurry me from this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_000.text: All right, I got some spirit power.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Hey, thanks, Dolores. But heck,
you're the reason I was able to do it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Oh, it thrills me to my core to hear
you say such a thing about me, Master!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_040.text: Now all that's left is to go back.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_SPIRIT_000_CUT_000_050.text: Now all that's left is to go back.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
Guess it's back to
the grave for me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
And I guess that means I'll be sayin'
farewell to this world as well.
Thanks for everything, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
Oh hey, it's you! But sure, yeah.
You were a huge help, so tag along
if you want.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
With the Dismal King the way he is,
he won't be able to grant my wish.
There can be no further meaning
in my remaining in this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
You sure about this, fella?
Might end up regretting it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_000_CUT_0.text:
Nay, YOU will be the one with regrets!
Do you not see what he truly is!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text: Master, wait! Don't leave me behind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text:
You really want to go with
me into this grave, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text:
No, I don't want to go in a grave...
but I want to be left behind even less!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_GRAVE_RETURN_010_CUT_0.text:
Hey, you're welcome to tag along
if that's what you want.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Guess it's back to
the grave for me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_001.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_001.text:
Guess it's back to
the well for me.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_002.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_002.text:
I should be able to get back
through these ruins.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
And I guess that means I'll be sayin'
farewell to this world as well.
Thanks for everything, Dolores.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh hey, it's you! But sure, yeah.
You were a huge help, so tag along
if you want.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Imakoo_Human
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
With the Dismal King the way he is,
he won't be able to grant my wish.
There can be no further meaning
in my remaining in this world.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
You sure about this, fella?
Might end up regretting it.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Nay, YOU will be the one with regrets!
Do you not see what he truly is!?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
I am a hunter paid to track
and kill fell fiends.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Truth exists regardless of my words.
Simply look, and you will see.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Wait, so he actually BECAME the wolf?
Holy smokes, it all makes sense now.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text: So he's a wolf. So what?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
In that case, I will handle him.
Thank you for your cooperation.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Take him or don't—it means nothing
to me, and you should do as you please.
The prey I truly seek is not so small a catch.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Hunter
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
Your judgment is unsound. This man
is my prey, and I will never permit him
to leave with you!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_WOLF_000_CUT_00.text:
If that's all done with,
let's get outta here.

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text: Master, wait! Don't leave me behind!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
You really want to go with me
into this grave, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
You really want to go with me
into this well, Dolores?

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
No, I don't want to go in a grave...
but I want to be left behind even less!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Dolores
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
No, I don't want to go in a well...
but I want to be left behind even less!

SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.speaker: Tsunanori_Mido
SUB_W03_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_DOLORES_000_CUT.text:
Hey, you're welcome to tag along
if that's what you want.
